name: Tennis Training and Coaching PRO
description:
Learn the Tennis with passion.
Tennis Training present the v1.0 of Tennis training & coaching PRO for the users of iPhone & iPad to learn the Tennis diffrenetly. Beginners and professionals can practice these shots
* ForeHand.
* Backhand.
* Flat Serve.
* Volley.
* TopSpin.
* Kick Serve.
* Half Volley.
* Slice Serve.
* Drop Shot.
* Passing Shot.
* Approach Shot and much more.
Application contains HD videos that contains coaching and practice stuff for beginners as well.
Download and enjoy.
